summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed recipient to appear and testify in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell on July 12, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906. The subpoena is signed by Assistant U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)), for which testimony is being compelled.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed and issued the subpoena.

connections.description: Strauss, as the prosecuting U.S. Attorney, is compelling testimony in the criminal case against Maxwell.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Testimony
events.description: The subpoena commands the recipient to appear in court to testify and give evidence in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York, Southern District of New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on April 28, 2021, compelling an unnamed individual's testimony in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)).
The required court appearance was scheduled for July 12, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906.
The subpoena was issued and signed by Assistant U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss.
Failure to comply with the subpoena would constitute contempt of court, subjecting the recipient to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
